name: complementarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
When different things work complementarily, they are useful when used together. : I think the two strategies are currently working complementarily. Retirement brings more involvement with the family. Complementarily, it also often brings a decrease in the older generation’s social interaction beyond the family.
More examplesFewer examplesWithin households, labour was complementarily organized by gender and seasonality. We have established and illustrated how these two methods can be used complementarily.All my skills are being developed and used in a corporate setting very complementarily.
